channel.title: Blogs on Maxim Zhiburt
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Maxim Zhiburt

item.title: About 'std::mem::transmut'ation
item.description: "I'm particularly interested in Transfiguration, you know, turning something into something else, of course, it's supposed to be very difficult —" — Hermione Granger regarding transformation [src] The do There's a type csv::StringRecords which doesn't implement IntoIterator but &csv::StringRecords does. I was thinking if we would keep the structure and the reference along themeslfs, it would be fine. But I know that rust does not allow that (yet, cause it's self-referenctial struct).

item.title: Cope with Garmin && Strava limits
item.description: One upon a time there has been a pile of activitis in Garmin Connect which was not synced with Strava. It was thought it will be an easy thing to do to just syncronize them via some import/export feature. But it turned out not to be the case. A case agains automatic syncranization You can sync your Garmin Connect and Strava directly? But in such case you'll import/export all data available.

item.title: How it was build
item.description: The site is built by Hugo with Hugo-Octopress theme. I have bumped into this theme coinsidentaly on this blog http://blog.pnkfx.org/. If you guess what is the thing in the header. This is my take on awesome octupus from the original theme http://octopress.org/ page. The idea that it resembles a shot from Ninja Turtles tv series. source - https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/ We override the original theme a little bit to be more compatible with original site.
